page.title: 04EXCERPTS FROM LOCAL PAPER
page.content: The Ludlow area is now completely switched over to Trimpley water,ending it's long association with the Elan Valley. A visit from the Duke of Gloucester marked the 50th anniversery of Ludlow firm F.W.McConnel which specializes in robotic and computerised farm machinery.By way of contrast he later toured Ludlows' historic town. The Old Street Action Committee are raising funds to convert the former Clifton Cinema to a community Center. Whitcliffe Commoners-Association is investigating reports of unlawful Sunday sales from car boots on the common.
